Name: Hargrave
About the game: Hargrave is a retro sci-fi shooter-platformer set in a maze of rooms loaded with obstacles and guarded by strange robots. Race to destroy the guardians and escape as quickly as possible, or explore the maze to find new powers and challenge the greater guardians that are sealed deep within.
